Shelgon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0371: Bagon
Pokémon
#0373: Salamence →

Shelgon has been featured on 17 different cards since it debuted in the EX Dragon expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Shelgon cards are normally Dragon-type Stage 1 Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Shelgon

Shelgon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #

Shelgon EX Deoxys 45/107 Clash of the Blue Sky 063/082
Shelgon δ EX Delta Species 53/113 Holon Research Tower Fire Quarter Deck   006/015
Shelgon δ EX Delta Species 54/113 Holon Research Tower 017/086
Shelgon δ EX Dragon Frontiers 38/101 Offense and Defense of the Furthest Ends 021/068
Shelgon EX Power Keepers 39/108 World Champions Pack 080/108
Shelgon Secret Wonders 64/132 Shining Darkness  
Shelgon Stormfront 50/100 Intense Fight in the Destroyed Sky 073/092
Shelgon Arceus 48/99 Advent of Arceus 070/090
Shelgon Dragon Vault   7/20 Dragon Selection   007/020
Plasma Blast 63/101 BW-P Promotional cards   194/BW-P
Shelgon Roaring Skies 56/108 Emerald Break 046/078
Shelgon Celestial Storm 105/168 Sky-Splitting Charisma 064/096

Shelgon Evolving Skies 108/203 Blue Sky Stream 044/067
Shelgon Journey Together 113/159 Battle Partners 071/100
